message.raw:
Workaround for tabMoved PyQt4 bug done in a better way so that we can
actually use signals for the animation. Tab insertion done at the correct
position, rather than at the incorrect one followed by an update,
as the latter would cause wrong animation.

message:
Workaround for tabMoved PyQt4 bug done in a better way so that we can
actually use signals for the animation. Tab insertion done at the correct
position, rather than at the incorrect one followed by an update,
as the latter would cause wrong animation.
